author: dougm
msg: perl_startup will now call perl_init_i18nl10n(1), for 'use locale'

author: dougm
msg: Makefile.PL will now set CFLAGS="$PERL_EXTRA_CFLAGS" with USE_APACI=1
thanks to help from Vivek Khera

author: khera
msg: Item on -DPERL_EMERGENCY_SBRK was prefixed with spaces, causing output
from pod translators to look funny.  Removed spaces so it formats
nicely, and is a new item in the list.

author: dougm
msg: improve support for Makefile.PL USE_APXS=... to generate modperl.config
